channel.title: HELP! How do I play Zelda Majoras Mask on an Emulator
channel.description: First of all, How do I play it on one, and were can I get an emulator and Majoras Mask for the PC.

item.title: HELP! How do I play Zelda Majoras Mask on an Emulator
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“llib, post:3, topic:123092”]If you guys want to use a really good site for roms in general, and emulator downloads, use:

http://www.emuparadise.org/

Its where I get all my roms from :D[/quote]Yep.

I’m an expert with Emulators and ROMs, especially when it comes to hacking. I love hacking them, even without hacking programs. Especially gamesharking them with custom codes, uber poonage.

Anyways, I also have the ROM for it on my comp atm, along with the emulator. Just Google “The Legend of Zelda: Majora’s Mask ROM” and you’ll most likely find it.

Also, the game sucks like hell without:

  1. Cheats
  2. It already half-way beaten

The beginning sucks and is as boring as hell. I recommend you find a saved file of a beaten one or so (A .SAV file I believe, that’s what it is for all GB/GBC/GBA ones atleast).

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! How do I play Zelda Majoras Mask on an Emulator
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

You need to get an n64 emulator, try “Project64”
Then search on google for “N64 Roms”
Then look for Majora’s mask on that site.
